title: Planet Rock
description: A seminal Bronx DJ during the 1970s, Afrika Bambaataa had a huge worldwide hit with Planet Rock, the 1982 hip-hop classic which blended the beats of hip-hop with techno-pop futurism inspired by German techno pioneers Kraftwerk. Includes three bonus remixes along with an acappella version. Digitally remastered. This product is an authorized manufactured on demand CD-R
store: Paul Oakenfold   Afrika Bambaataa   Format: Audio CD
